DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate ability SonarMed AirWave provide clinician information enable confirm continuous proper placement endotracheal tube . This initial study prospective , observational , look CXR result , compare AirWave system output data .
DOC.brief_title: Novel Device Assess Endotracheal Tube Migration
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Subjects eligible inclusion study meet ALL follow criterion : Oral nasal endotracheal intubation , anticipate last least 48 hour Adults require ETT internal diameter size 6.5 9.0 mm Subject must least 18 year old ( upper age limitation ) English speak patients/decision maker . Exclusion Criteria Subjects ventilate tracheostomy Subjects 18 year age
